nodes.text: The Reconstruction Authority Space Patrol (RASP), also known as the Reconstruction Police, was the law enforcement branch of the Reconstruction Authority which was set up by the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances in the aftermath of the Yuuzhan Vong War. They were assigned the duty of fighting smugglers and pirates.

The RASP were known for using XJ5 X-wing starfighters. During their years of operation, they claimed to have captured the pirate Three-Eye, but in actuality, Three-Eye had already been captured by two Jedi Knights who handed her over to them.
Around 39 ABY, the RASP was disbanded.
